reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for just one night in May, had apartment on top floor overlooking the courtyard so nice and quiet. Friendly front desk. Left for airport early following morning so can't really comment on the facilities but price was very cheap so would consider it very good value.
reviews.title: Good apartment

reviews.text: We just got home from a wonderful week in Sardinia, Alghero.
reviews.title: Very outdated but cozy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Picale as a package deal from our travel agent. We were positively surprised by both the service and cleanliness in hotel's area.
reviews.title: STAY AWAY

reviews.text: The apartment was moderate in size and could do with an renovation, but it gives a different cozy holiday atmosphere anyway. One should expect that the whole thing is quite worn out but still usable.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.text: The living room / kitchen consists of a sofa bed, a foldable table and 3 dining chairs. There is a small cabinet containing various kitchen utensils such as plates, cups and glasses. The tv is placed on this cabinet. There is a lot of closet space in both the living room and the bedroom.
reviews.title: Too far from town and EVERYTHING is charged as an "extra"!!
